purpose: Instruct LEGO decomposition agent on optimal sentence breakpoints to maximize recombinatory power
strategy: High composability chunks should be EXPOSED (separated) to enable maximum substitution; low composability chunks should remain BONDED to their context

decomposition_rules.description: Chunks with composability_score >= 9 should ALWAYS be exposed as separate LEGO pieces
decomposition_rules.rationale: These chunks can combine with many other pieces, so exposing them maximizes recombinatory potential

decomposition_rules.description: Modal verbs (voglio, posso, devo) should be separated from their infinitives
decomposition_rules.rationale: Modal can attach to many different infinitives; infinitive can follow many modals. Splitting exposes both edges.

decomposition_rules.description: Prepositions (con, a, di, per, in) should separate from objects to expose both edges
decomposition_rules.rationale: Preposition can attach to many objects; object can follow many prepositions

decomposition_rules.description: Conjunctions (che, ma, e, quando) should separate from clauses
decomposition_rules.rationale: Conjunction bridges two independent pieces; exposed edges enable recombination

decomposition_rules.description: Chunks with composability_score <= 5 should REMAIN BONDED to context
decomposition_rules.rationale: Limited combinatorial freedom; breaking would create unusable pieces
decomposition_rules.action: KEEP bonded with articles, context, or containers

decomposition_rules.description: Articles (il, la, un, una) should bond with their head noun as single unit
decomposition_rules.rationale: In Italian, articles are obligatory; separating creates orphaned pieces

decomposition_rules.description: Continuous structures (sto + gerund) should split with explicit edge
decomposition_rules.rationale: Gerund can attach to different auxiliaries; auxiliary can use different gerunds

decomposition_rules.description: Adjectives and adverbs modifying verbs/adjectives should be separable
decomposition_rules.rationale: High substitution value: 'parlare bene', 'parlare meglio', 'parlare velocemente'

decomposition_rules.description: Negation particle (non) should be separated to expose verb edges
decomposition_rules.rationale: Can negate any verb; exposes both negation and affirmative verb edges

decomposition_rules.description: Temporal adverbs (adesso, domani, ieri, stasera) can be separate LEGO pieces
decomposition_rules.rationale: Can attach to many sentence types; enables temporal variation

PREPOSITIONS.left_edges_variety: High - attaches to verbs, adjectives, nouns
PREPOSITIONS.right_edges_variety: High - attaches to pronouns, infinitives, nouns, locations

CONJUNCTIONS.note: These bridge entire clauses; exposing maximizes structural recombination

NEGATION.recombination_insight: Any positive verb becomes negative; doubles potential combinations

voglio.decomposition_action: EXPOSE - separate from preceding connector and from infinitive

parlare.decomposition_action: EXPOSE as core infinitive - separate from modal/auxiliary and from objects

con.decomposition_action: EXPOSE - critical connector; separate from both verb and pronoun

a.decomposition_action: EXPOSE - most versatile preposition; separate from both sides

italiano.decomposition_action: EXPOSE but note: often follows verbs/prepositions; main recombination via left edges

non.recombination_potential: Creates binary (affirmative/negative) for any verb/adj; doubles all combinations
non.decomposition_action: ALWAYS EXPOSE - negation is a high-leverage recombination point

INFINITIVE_VERBS.recombination_value: Each infinitive can replace others in same position

MODAL_VERBS.recombination_value: Each modal can precede same set of infinitives

PRONOUNS_POSTPREPOSITION.recombination_value: Enables personalization: 'con te' vs 'con lui' vs 'con loro'

ARTICLES_WITH_NOUNS.decomposition: BOND article + noun as single unit (e.g., 'la_frase', 'un_tempo')

MODIFIERS_AFTER_VERB.substitution_position: After action verb ([VERB] [___], e.g., 'parlare bene' vs 'parlare meglio')
MODIFIERS_AFTER_VERB.decomposition: EXPOSE modifiers separately for adverbial variation

pattern_NEGATION_VERB.recombination_insight: Doubles combinations: for every 'voglio X', get 'non voglio X'

pattern_OBJECT_MODIFIER.decomposition: Split if modifier is high-composability adjective/adverb

NEGATION.total_recombinatory_power: Creates binary (neg/pos) for entire sentence space

by_decomposition_quality.optimal_split_count: Aim for 4-6 LEGO pieces per average seed
by_decomposition_quality.example_seed: Voglio parlare italiano con te adesso.
by_decomposition_quality.recombination_gain: Optimal exposes 6 independent edges vs suboptimal's 2 edges

agent_instructions.step_1_identify_high_composability: Mark all chunks with composability_score >= 9 as EXPOSURE_CANDIDATES
agent_instructions.step_2_mark_connector_boundaries: For each connector (modal, preposition, conjunction, negation), mark boundaries on both sides
agent_instructions.step_3_bond_low_composability: Keep chunks with score <= 5 bonded to their host (e.g., articles to nouns)
agent_instructions.step_4_test_recombination: For each proposed LEGO piece, verify it has >=2 left_edges AND >=2 right_edges (unless it's sentence-final)
agent_instructions.step_5_maximize_edges: Prefer splits that expose high-edge chunks (score 10) over medium-edge chunks (score 6)
agent_instructions.step_6_create_edge_labels: For each LEGO piece, label all left_edges and right_edges explicitly
agent_instructions.step_7_generate_recombinations: For top 20% LEGO pieces (by composability), generate 5-10 novel recombination examples
